result_list.explanation: Indicates the addressee of a speech.
General character action (verb 'entendre frapper' means 'hear knocking').
result_list.stgdir: On entend frapper et la porte. - Se levant.

result_list.explanation: Non-verbal character interaction (verb 'jeter un regard' means 'to cast a look').
result_list.stgdir: Délie lui jette un regard passionné.

result_list.explanation: Narration describing a moment in the play.
Indicates the addressee of a speech.
Music description ('Ensemble' often refers to a musical cue).
Indicates the addressee of a speech.
Narration describing a sound effect ('une cloche' means 'a bell').
result_list.stgdir: On entend une cloche derrière le théâtre.
